p: A literature search of the PubMed database using the keywords (chloroquine OR hydroxychloroquine OR baricitinib OR cyclosporine OR hydroxyurea OR minocycline OR mycophenolic acid OR mycophenolate mofetil OR leflunomide OR tofacitinib OR thalidomide) AND (virus OR viral) was performed from inception to 13 May 2020 ( Figure 1). Reference lists of pertinent articles were hand searched for additional studies of interest.
